title: Hairdresser
summary: A hairdresser is a person whose occupation is to cut or style hair in order to change or maintain a person's image. This is achieved using a combination of hair coloring, haircutting, and hair texturing techniques. Examples of professional titles in Canada include 'barber,' 'hairstylist,' 'hair colour technician,' 'hairdresser, and 'wig stylist.' Each professional title also has an 'apprentice' version. Canada also provides Red Seal endorsements dependent on local qualification.[1]
